communityconfiguration-editor-chip-contr: Press Enter to edit or Delete to remove
communityconfiguration-editor-client-gen: Something went wrong while loading the configuration editor. Please try again later.
An error occurred in '$2' in component $1. See details below:
communityconfiguration-editor-client-pos: If the problem persists, consider [$1 leaving feedback] in the talk page.
communityconfiguration-editor-client-val: There {{PLURAL:$1|is an error|are $1 errors}} in the form:
communityconfiguration-guidelines-descri: Community Configuration is a tool that allows communities to set up and control the configuration of different {{SITENAME}} features, helping administrators suit their community specific needs.
communityconfiguration-guidelines-guidel: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Community_configuration Learn more] about Community Configuration, what it is, how it works, and the team’s ongoing work on it.
We would love to hear {{GENDER:$1|your}} thoughts! Reach out to us through our [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk:Growth talk page].
communityconfiguration-invalid-stored-co: Failed to load a valid configuration from the $1 (code $2) provider.
Failed to load a valid configuration from the $1 (code $2) provider, see $3.
communityconfiguration-edit-summary-remi: Reminder: This change may impact a large number of community members, please consider indicating why {{GENDER:$1|you}} are making the change and linking to any related community discussion if appropriate.
communityconfiguration-edit-summary-dial: Describe the changes that were made in the configuration
communityconfiguration-editor-client-dat: Something went wrong while saving {{GENDER:$1|your}} changes. Please try again later.
communityconfiguration-editor-nojs-fallb: The configuration editor requires JavaScript. Please enable JavaScript to be able to use it.
communityconfiguration-editor-client-not: This page is protected. Configuration for this feature is only editable by administrators.
{{GENDER:$1|You}} cannot save changes to this form because configuration for this feature is only editable by administrators.
communityconfiguration-editor-error-vali: There must be a maximum of {{PLURAL:$1|$1 item|$1 items}} in the array
There must be a minimum of {{PLURAL:$1|$1 item|$1 items}} in the array
Does not have a value in the enumeration: $1
Must be at least $1 characters long
Must be at most $1 characters long
tag-community_configuration-description: Edits that change the [[Special:CommunityConfiguration|local wiki configuration]] of a feature using the [[mw:Extension:CommunityConfiguration|Community Configuration extension]].
